## okta-admin idps unlinkuser

Removes the link between the Okta user and the IdP user.

### Synopsis

Removes the link between the Okta user and the IdP user.

```
okta-admin idps unlinkuser <idpId> <userId> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for unlinkuser
```
